Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.example.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class GameController extends Object implements ActionListener
A class to connect the GUI with the game logic

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameController(GameLogic gameLogic, Board board, boolean thrown)
    Constructor for the GameController class Connecting the brain of the game with the GUI Also storing thrown in case of a saved game
